solution_line_template: In the final 40 seconds, the Fireflies scored seven {points_per_three_point_basket}-point baskets to improve their score by {points_per_three_point_basket}*{fireflies_three_point_baskets}=<<{fireflies_three_point_baskets}*{points_per_three_point_basket}={fireflies_points_from_baskets}>>{fireflies_points_from_baskets} points.

Thus, the Fireflies final total was {fireflies_initial_score}+{fireflies_points_from_baskets}=<<{fireflies_initial_score}+{fireflies_points_from_baskets}={fireflies_final_score}>>{fireflies_final_score} points.

In the final 40 seconds, the hornets scored an additional two {points_per_two_point_basket}-point baskets to improve their score by {points_per_two_point_basket}*{hornets_two_point_baskets}=<<{points_per_two_point_basket}*{hornets_two_point_baskets}={hornets_points_from_baskets}>>{hornets_points_from_baskets} points.
Thus, the Hornets final total was {hornets_initial_score}+{hornets_points_from_baskets}=<<{hornets_initial_score}+{hornets_points_from_baskets}={hornets_final_score}>>{hornets_final_score} points.
The final difference in points between the two teams was {fireflies_final_score}-{hornets_final_score}=<<{fireflies_final_score}-{hornets_final_score}={final_difference}>>{final_difference} points.
